# Audio-Digital-Project

```This project is to make an audio recording which is then stored in the ATMEGA 2560 EEPROM and converted into a PWM signal then the audio output is output to the active speaker.```

---
### Komponen
1. Arduino Mega2560
2. Push Button
---
